snippet: The World Health Organization said data from Brazil had convinced its experts that no infections had occurred either during the Games or after visitors and athletes had gone home....
abstract: World Health Organization announces that neither athletes nor visitors to Brazil during 2016 Olympics reported any Zika infections.
lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization said data from Brazil had convinced its experts that no infections had occurred either during the Games or after visitors and athletes had gone home.

headline.main: No Zika Cases Reported During Rio Olympics, W.H.O. Says
headline.print_headline: Rio Olympics Had No Cases of Zika Virus, Report Finds
